title: Just imagine this, GD.
body:
Just imagine laying on a comfortable rug with a gorgeous pureblooded female Siberian Husky who is as down to snuggle as you are while you're both basked by the warm glow of your fireplace and you fall asleep in each others loving embrace and then you wake up at around noon to the feeling of her kissing your cheeks with her cute little pink tongue and you go for a relaxing walk in the woods together

How could you ever think, *"muh 2d toony waifu is better!"?*
